details:
The Xsendfile module enables fast transfer for private files in Drupal.

In order to control private file downloads, the module overrides `ImageStyleDownloadController`, for which a vulnerability was disclosed in [SA-CORE-2023-005](https://www.drupal.org/sa-core-2023-005). The Xsendfile module was still based on an insecure version of `ImageStyleDownloadController`.
